name: CRAPONG!
description:
thanks for visiting download below if you want idk

OFFICIAL WEBSITE WATCH THE SOUNDTRACK ON YOUTUBE!

WARNING: The WebGL multiplayer may be buffy, download below if you want it to be better!

WHAT IS CRAPONG!?

CRAPONG! is a crappy pong clone which also contains multiplayer (crossplatform)!
it also has decent graphics but noone cares about that

also it was made in like 2 days but nobody cares

HOW TO PLAY?

2 PLAYER LOCAL MODE: W | S FOR LEFT PLAYER AND UP ARROW | DOWN ARROW FOR RIGHT PLAYER

ANYTHING ELSE?

Not really, note that the game is not that good, it was made in like 2 days and the core mechanics were made in 1 hour. the multiplayer is still secure tho dont worry

also pausing doesn't work on multiplayer, whoops
if you don't focus on the window on multiplayer and you are the host then the other client is gonna lag a bit

ALSO VISIT MY WEBSITE: bl4ckk.tk
AND MY GAME: getrigid.tk
